miic.core.miic_utils.trace_calc_az_baz_dist¶

trace_calc_az_baz_dist(tr1, tr2)[source]¶

Return azimut, back azimut and distance between tr1 and tr2 This funtions calculates the azimut, back azimut and distance between tr1 and tr2 if both have geo information in their stats dictonary. Required fields are:

tr.stats.sac.stla tr.stats.sac.stlo
Parameters:
  • tr1 (Trace) – First trace to account
  • tr2 (Trace) – Second trace to account
Return type:

float
Returns:

az: Azimut angle between tr1 and tr2
Return type:

float
Returns:

baz: Back azimut angle between tr1 and tr2
Return type:

float
Returns:

dist: Distance between tr1 and tr2
